2068080.name: NEOTAG LEAGUE
2068080.description:
Team up, step into the arena , and prepare for heart-pumping battles as you fight for the ball in thrilling online matches!

✦NEOTAG LEAGUE✦ is a physics-based futuristic ball sport game, where two parkour robots teams compete in an arena.

This sport is a mix of parkour and football (soccer).

⊲ PVP MATCHES ⊳

With its fast-paced gameplay and thrilling team-based PVP matches, NEOTAG LEAGUE will put your skills to the ultimate test. Master all parkour mechanics (jump, dash, roll, wall run, grapple) to outplay your opponents and win the match!

Face off against an opponent in a 1v1 duel, or join a team to play 2v2 or 3v3 matches.

⊲ SOLO MODE ⊳

Improve your movement skills in intense single player levels.

Try to push your parkour game to the limit to break the record in this 'Time Attack' gameplay!

⊲ MORE INFO ⊳

The project started in September 2021, and I'm working solo on it.

The game was released in Early Access on January 10, 2025, with the hope of releasing a definitive version by the start of 2026.
